Remington heritage co

About the company

  • home

  • login

Remington heritage co honors the legacy of mechanical type we are a small studio dedicated to restoration reproduction and manufacture of pieces inspired by classic mechanical typography

our mission

To preserve and celebrate the art of mechanical writing through high quality products that combine traditional craftsmanship with modern design we believe in focused distraction free writing experiences in todays digital age

craftsmanship and values

Every remington heritage co piece is created with respect for traditional mechanical processes our work emphasizes precision durability and timeless design each machine is functional and meaningful

We value patience focus and the physical connection between writer and machine our products invite a slower more deliberate creative rhythm

history and milestones

1873-Original foundation of the remington typewriter line

1900s-Peak of remington typewriter popularity becoming a staple in offices and homes worldwide

2025-Remington heritage co is founded to launch the smarttype concept
